alert.note: Alert for Minnehaha (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 11 at 9:31AM MDT until April 15 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Dakota... Big Sioux River at Sioux Falls I-90 affecting Minnehaha County. Big Sioux River near Brookings affecting Moody and Brookings Counties. Big Sioux River below Dell Rapids affecting Minnehaha County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Iowa... South Dakota...Minnesota... Rock River at Rock Rapids affecting Lyon County. Big Sioux River at Brandon affecting Minnehaha, Lyon and Lincoln Counties. Big Sioux River near Estelline affecting Brookings and Hamlin Counties. Medary Creek near Medary affecting Brookings County. Big Sioux River near Bruce affecting Brookings County. Big Sioux River near Canton affecting Sioux, Lyon and Lincoln Counties. Big Sioux River at Akron affecting Plymouth and Union Counties. Big Sioux River above Hawarden affecting Sioux, Union and Lincoln Counties. Sixmile Creek near Brookings affecting Brookings County. Rock River near Hardwick affecting Rock County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Sioux River below Dell Rapids. * WHEN...Until Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, agricultural lands along the lower banks of the river begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 12.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:30 AM CDT Tuesday was 13.3 feet. - Forecast...The river will slowly fall to 12.2 feet by Wednesday afternoon. There could be a slight rise Thursday evening followed by gradual falling later in the week. It should fall below flood stage Friday evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Big Sioux River Dell Rapids 12.0 12.4 Tue 9 am 12.2 12.4 12.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday afternoon at 1215 PM CDT.
